Package no.brunostengine.components

Class Component

java.lang.Object
no.brunostengine.components.Component
Direct Known Subclasses:
Animator, BasePlayerController, BoxCollider, CapsuleCollider, CircleCollider, Collideable, DebugTools, EditorCamera, FollowTargetCamera, GameCamera, GridLines, KeyControls, NonCollideable, Rigidbody, Spawner, SpriteRenderer, TestCamera, Tile, Transform
public abstract class Component extends Object
The Component class is the most essential part of a GameObject. This class fulfills the design principle of Entity-Component Design. TODO: check if correct
